summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Discovery Park; authorizing acquisition of real property and acceptance of deeds; authorizing acceptance of certain utility infrastructure and associated easements, clarification of certain existing utility easements and termination of certain private utility easements; and increasing appropriations to the Department of Parks and Recreation in the 2007 Budget; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
note: Capehart Naval Housing Area Property Acquisition
